org.giiwa.web

注释类型 Path


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Path
    the Path annotation interface used to define a Web api, for each annotated method, the framework will auto generate the web api mapping for the method,
    the whole web api uri should be= http://[host]/[classname]/[method path], method including: 
     path=X.NONE (no path defined)
 method=Model.METHOD_GET|MOdel.METHOD_POST (handle all request method)
 login=false (no required login)
 access=X.NONE (not required access key name)
 accesslog=true (record the accesslog if the run level is debug)
    作者:
    joe

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      java.lang.String access
      the access key that required, default is "none".
      java.lang.String demo
      demo account
      boolean login
      login required, default is "false".
      java.lang.String method
      the method of request, default for all.
      java.lang.String path
      the URI path, default is "none".

    • 元素详细资料

      • path

        public abstract java.lang.String path
        the URI path, default is "none".
        返回:
        String
        默认值:
        "none"

      • method

        public abstract java.lang.String method
        the method of request, default for all.
        返回:
        int
        默认值:
        "GET,POST"

      • login

        public abstract boolean login
        login required, default is "false".
        返回:
        boolean
        默认值:
        false

      • access

        public abstract java.lang.String access
        the access key that required, default is "none".
        返回:
        String
        默认值:
        "none"

      • demo

        public abstract java.lang.String demo
        demo account
        返回:
        默认值:
        ""
